H0.text: Prior to Andy Murray who was the last British player to contest a tennis Grand Slam singles final. Tim Henman

H1.text: Prior to Andy Murray who was the last British player to contest a tennis Grand Slam singles final. Greg Rusedski's contemporary, Mark Petchey

H2.text: Prior to Andy Murray who was the last British player to contest a tennis Grand Slam singles final. John Lloyd

H3.text: Prior to Andy Murray who was the last British player to contest a tennis Grand Slam singles final. Rusedski

A4.text: Rusedski reached the singles final of the US Open in 1997
